#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int val[123456], wt[123456];
int n, m;
bool check(double x){
	vector<double> vec;
	for(int i = 0; i < n; i++){
		double tmp = val[i];
		double tmp1 = wt[i];
		tmp1 *= x;
		tmp -= tmp1;
		vec.push_back(tmp);
	}
	double sum =0;
	sort(vec.rbegin(), vec.rend());
	for(int i = 0; i < m; i++)
		sum += vec[i];
	//cout<<"here2\n";
	if(sum >= 0) return true;
	return false;
}

int main(){
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--){
		scanf("%d%d",&n,&m);
		for(int i = 0; i < n; i++)
			scanf("%d%d",&val[i],&wt[i]);
		//cout<<"here\n";
		double low = 0, hi = 1e8;
		double err = 1e-9;
		while(abs(low -hi) > err){
			double mid = (low + hi)/2.0;
			if(check(mid))
				low = mid;
			else
				hi = mid;
		}
		printf("%lf\n",low);
	}
	return 0;
}
